hero.title: FinWave - Manage Your Finances With Ease!
hero.description: FinWave is an open-source solution that helps you manage your family and personal finances with features like automatic transactions, customizable currency, multiple account management and so on. Your data is safe: deploy to your own infrastructure!

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Embrace a community-driven budgeting app where openness enhances security and fosters trust.

webBased.title: Web-Based
webBased.description: Log in from any browser for an effortless budgeting experience, with no downloads or installations necessary.

deepAnalytics.title: Deep Analytics
deepAnalytics.description: Easily dissect your finances with our intuitive tag-based transaction, for a clearer financial picture.

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: Set up recurring payments once and never miss a transaction again, freeing you up for the important things in life.

exportCSV.title: Export to CSV
exportCSV.description: Take control of your transactions with quick exports to CSV for detailed analysis or convenient record-keeping.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language
multiLanguage.description: Budgeting is borderless with our multi-language support; manage your finances in the language you speak at home.

install.title: Installation is a Breeze
install.description: Ensure you have Docker-Compose installed on your preferred Linux distribution, and with just a few simple commands, you'll be on your way to financial clarity.
